title: Poikkaal Kuthirai Lyrics Samar Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Poikkaal Kuthirai
Singer: Yuvan Shankar Raja
Movie: Samar
Music : Yuvan Shankar Raja
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar
Other Song Lyrics
Azhago Azhagu
Poikkaal Kuthirai
Vellai Mayil
Rajaavin Thotathil
Oru Kannil Vegam
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Poikkaal Kuthirai vazhkaiyada
pogum valiyo dhooramada
Irulum oliyum idaiyiniley
Sadukudu nadathidum neramada

Kalayil kan vizhikayil
indruenna varum yaarukum therivadhillai
Saalayil kan modhinaal
naam marupadi nadandhida marupadhilai

Kodutha nirangalai nirappa
Vazhkai ondrum kelviyillai
Iruttinil nadhigal nagardhaalum
Saththam adhai sollividum

sudalaimey ariyum velai
suthiram idhudhaan katruppaar
unnai vittu veliyaeri
unnai neeye uttruppaar

indha kaleidoscope kannaadi thundugalai
uruttuvadhu yaar, mirattuvadhu yaar
thurathuvadhu yaar, purattuvadhu yaar
Yaar yaar yaar yaar

Ivan paartha kaatchigal pizhaithaana
Illai thodarndhu thurathidum mazhaithaana (2)

Moochu vaangudhey moochu vaangudhey
vittu vittu vittu moochu vaangudhey
Kaatchi marudhey kaatchi maarudhey
Kannai katti vittu saatchi maarudhey

Ivan maaya theeyile vilundhaana
Ini kaayam indriye eluvaana

Moochu vaangudhey moochu vaangudhey
vittu vittu vittu moochu vaangudhey
Kaatchi marudhey kaatchi maarudhey
Kannai katti vittu saatchi maarudhey

Ivan paadhai engilum valithaana?
idhu thaedi vandhadhil vilai thaanai?

Moochu vaangudhey moochu vaangudhey
vittu vittu vittu moochu vaangudhey
Kaatchi marudhey kaatchi maarudhey
Kannai katti vittu saatchi maarudheyEnglish Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
